name: January 2017
description:
What we have here is just a simple text-based game for under a half hour which encompasses every conversation i had that felt meaningful for the month of January, 2017 (two years after my last relationship). It's a peer into the sick twisted mind of someone left in relative isolation, but also, it's not very good and somewhat unintelligible, but if you want some raw bitterness and insecurity, this is a decent place to look.

This game is a cry for help.
